name: Iron Survival
description:
Alone or with friends, your mission is to survive an epic ocean adventure
a dangerous sea! Collect debris to survive, beware of dangers
of the island

Trapped on a large island with nothing else, players wake up on a vast island,
With a dry throat and an empty stomach,
survival won't be easy!

Iron Survival catapults you and your friends on an epic adventure on the open sea, and between the lands with the
goal to stay alive, collect resources and build a houseboat or land worthy of this
survival.

Resources are hard to find - players will need to make sure they catch all floating debris using their trusty hook and, whenever possible, sweep away the reefs beneath the waves and islands above.
However, thirst and hunger are not the only danger on the island ... beware of man-
a stranger can end your journey!


Features:
● Multiplayer! Survive alone or with friends in online co-op!
● Craft! Build survival gear, weapons, farmland, and more to help you stay alive!
● Build! Expand your island from a simple wreck to a floating palace.
● Search! Learn new things to create in the lookup table.
● Browse! Navigate your raft to new places!
● Immerse yourself! Drop anchor and explore the depths for more resources.
● Fight! Defend your base from harm



Matt Sowards For the help of the graphics and the upload on stem I'm very good boy
